DOC.brief_summary: Study SPC3649-207E is designed as an extension study to the prior protocol to provide additional long-term safety and efficacy information for subjects participating in Study SPC3649-207.
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Extension to Miravirsen Study in Null Responder to Pegylated Interferon Alpha Plus Ribavirin Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis C
DOC.criteria: Participated in study SPC3649207 Received investigational drug therapy after discontinuation, termination, or successful completion of study SPC3649207
